description:
### 11.193 pixelize

Apply pixelization to video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:

**width, w**

**height, h**

    Set block dimensions that will be used for pixelization. Default value is 16. 

**mode, m**

    Set the mode of pixelization used. Possible values are: ‘avg’ ‘min’ ‘max’ Default value is avg. 

**planes, p**

    Set what planes to filter. Default is to filter all planes.
name: pixelize

options.description: Set block dimensions that will be used for pixelization. Default value is 16.
options.name: width

options.description: Set block dimensions that will be used for pixelization. Default value is 16.
options.name: height

options.description:
Set the mode of pixelization used.

Possible values are:

‘avg’
‘min’
‘max’

Default value is avg.
options.name: mode

options.description: Set what planes to filter. Default is to filter all planes.
options.name: planes
